name: SeniorCareHomes.com
tag_list: assisted-living, nursing-homes, senior-housing, senior-care, senior-care-homes, senior-living, seniors, caregiving
description: Helping Seniors Find Best Senior Housing
overview:
SeniorCareHomes.com (formerly known as La Dolce Living) was co-founded by a doctor with over 40 years in the medical field and Information Technology Executives. SeniorCareHomes.comâ€™s free website services enables Seniors and their Families find and compare quality, affordable licensed senior care homes and facilities in California, Florida, Arizona, New York, Oregon and across the United States. Users can also read articles by recognized industry professionals and join discussion forums with others going through the same senior care challenges.

SeniorCareHomes.com also provides FREE placement service for Seniors and their families. Helping Seniors and families find the best Senior Care Homes in the nation! SeniorCareHomes.com works with the best Senior Care facilities in the nation, which include owners of Assisted living and Independent living communities, Nursing Homes, Senior Care Homes, Residential Care Homes, Alzheimerâ€™s and Dementia Care facilities, Retirement Communities and other types of Senior Housing.

SeniorCareHomes.com has an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and they are headquartered in Mission Viejo, California. For more information, visit www.SeniorCareHomes.com.
